A mụrụ Owen Omogiafo na Mee 28, 1980 na Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria
Ọ gara mahadum Benin, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ (nsọpụrụ okpukpu abụọ) na Sociology na Anthropology

O nwetara nzere Master of Science na Human Resource Management site na London School of Economics and Political Science ma bụrụkwa nwata akwụkwọ nke Lagos Business School na IESE Business School, Spain.
